const AutoDelete< TYPE > & operator= (TYPE *ToCopy)
 Affectation operator with a TYPE pointer. If there is already a pointer kept by this AutoDelete, a Simple Exception will raise.
bool operator== (const TYPE *ToCompare)
 Comparaison operator. Return true if the kept pointer is equal to ToCompare.
bool operator== (const AutoDelete< TYPE > &ToCompare)
 Comparaison operator. Return true if the both kept pointers are the same (must never appear if you do not want to have multiple destructor calls !).
bool operator!= (const TYPE *ToCompare)
 Comparaison operator. Return true if the kept pointer is *not* equal to ToCompare.
bool operator!= (const AutoDelete< TYPE > &ToCompare)
 Comparaison operator. Return true if the both kept pointers are not the same (must always be the case !).

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::AutoDelete< TYPE >

AutoDelete object in order to free pointers.

Enable to manage automatically destruction of pointers when leaving scope.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz
